title: What do you think about mysterious things? - Quora

response.answer_text: To be honest, mysterious things are just mysterious. They are the things that can't be understood very easily and they attract our minds, force our thoughts to the extremes in order to reveal them. We always think there's something special about them, something unearthly, and that's what makes them so much interesting. It's human nature, if you ask me, to get attracted by them. We feel a strong urge to solve them or understand its proper nature. And when the explanations aren't that much believable we investigated the matter more, in search of the truth. And in the end either we get a new discovery and theory or an unforgettable superstition.  That's what I came up with after reading the question. Recently I'm spending my days with complete slothfulness. I'm about to achieve the pinnacles of extreme laziness. Ah! What an achievement! Oh! I forget to mention this: Thanks for A2A Keito Kurogane
